summary: Chef Yualk is a master of his work. He knows how to handle a knife and fork... and a hammer!
descriptionHtml:
Chef Yualk is a master of his work. He knows how to handle a knife and fork... and a hammer!
Yualk is bigger then the average npc and is set at a base level of 18 - 55 one and two handed!

[color=#ffff00]
[u][b][size=4]VOICE ACTING TO BE DONE[/size][/b][/u][/color]
ALSO IN SE

[color=#ffff00][u]Q&A[/u][/color]
Location?  
Silver Blood Inn in Markarth

Anymore Updates?
We'll See

Found a Bug?
Use discussion and i'll do my best to help
author: creedkaile
